title: game freezes during champ select lost 40 lp and have 5 20min bans nothing i can do
body: done hexteck repair tool initiated full repair done ever sngle walkthrough you have up here, basically i want my bans gone im not sure if its my computer or theres a glitch in ranked but the game is different for me for instance in normals i have o lag and in ranked i always have about 200ms to 240ms but norms its 35 flat everytime.. right now it goes in to cxahmpion seclect and then freezes every time i try to play
